title: Video Photobooth
description: This video looks at how to save a history of images from a live camera in p5.js / JavaScript.  I first look at saving a single snapshot, followed by an array of images.  The video ends with a "Muybridge" style animation of motion.

codeExamples.title: Video Photobooth
codeExamples.description: The sketch demonstrates how save and display a sequence of video frames .
